name: wp-logo-login | تغییر لوگو ورود و سربرگ
author: امیررضا حیدری و تیم کلارو

sections.description: With the help of this plugin, you can change the logo of the WordPress admin section, this plugin makes your work very easy and you can do it with a few clicks.
sections.installation:
This section explains how to install the plugin and set it up.

Enter the wp-content section and then enter the plugins section and upload the file there.
Then enter the plugins section and select the activation option.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • A change since the previous version.
  • fixed bugs

1.1

  • Add Persian fonts
  • Added the ability to replace the browser header icon

1.2

  • Added the ability to adjust Persian fonts and change the font size.

2.0

  • Removing the fonts section due to the large volume

2.0.1

  • Changing the title of the plugin and the text of the admin panel to the name of logo settings

short_description: With the help of this plugin, you can change the logo of the WordPress admin section.
description: With the help of this plugin, you can change the logo of the WordPress admin section, this plugin makes your work very easy and you can do it with a few clicks.

upgrade_notice.1.0: The logo placement plugin has been updated and its bugs fixed.
upgrade_notice.1.1: Added the ability to replace the header icon with Persian font.
upgrade_notice.1.2: Added the ability to adjust Persian fonts and change the font size.
upgrade_notice.2.0: Removing the fonts section due to the large volume
upgrade_notice.2.0.1: Changing the title of the plugin and the text of the admin panel to the name of logo settings
